-- getSpaceLibList 리스트
SELECT BBS_ID AS bbsId /*게시판ID*/ ,BBS_CD AS bbsCd /*분석게시판코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('SPACE_BBS_CD', A.BBS_CD) AS bbsNm /*분석게시판명*/ ,BBS_TITL AS bbsTitl /*게시판제목*/ ,BBS_SBC AS bbsSbc /*게시판내용*/ ,RGST_ID AS rgstId /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS rgstNm /*등록자이름*/ ,RTRV_CT AS rtrvCt /*조회건수*/ ,BBS_KWD AS bbsKwd /*키워드*/ ,ATTC_FILE_ID AS attcFilId /*첨부파일ID*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS frstRgstDt /*등록일*/ ,DEL_YN AS delYn /*삭제여부*/ FROM IRIS_SPACE_BBS_MST A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND BBS_CD in ('02','03','04','05','06','07','08')
AND BBS_CD = #{bbsCd}
AND BBS_TITL like '%${searchNm}%'
AND BBS_SBC like '%${searchNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) like '%${searchNm}%'
AND (BBS_TITL like '%${searchNm}%' OR BBS_SBC like '%${searchNm}%')
AND ANL_TLCG_CL_CD = '${anlTlcgClCd}'
ORDER BY BBS_ID DESC
